mapper.sql: HE109_T,CP10A_T, CP10B_T,ROUND(AI014,2) AS AI014, ROUND(AI013,2) AS AI013, COMPRESSOR_P, CP10A_P,CP10B_P,T852_P,T853_P, ROUND(AI016,2) AS AI016, ROUND(AI015,0) AS AI015, ROUND(ATD_102,3) AS ATD_102, ROUND(ATD_101,3) AS ATD_101, ROUND(ATD_104,3) AS ATD_104, ROUND(ATD_105,3) AS ATD_105, ROUND(ATD_103,3) AS ATD_103, ROUND(AI011,2) AS AI011, ROUND(AI05,2) AS AI05, AI29,AI30, ROUND(AI08,2) AS AI08, ROUND(AI028,2) AS AI028, ROUND(AI01,2) AS AI01, ROUND(AI020,2) AS AI020, D24_24,D25_0,D25_1,D25_2, D25_3,D25_4,D25_5,D25_6, D25_7,D29_0,D29_1,D27_36, D27_76,SUBSTR(UPTIME,1,19) AS UPTIME
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_data_anting WHERE UPTIME=(SELECT MAX(UPTIME) FROM TBL_DATA_ANTING)

select count(*) FROM TBL_DATA_ANTING_HOUR WHERE SUBSTR(UPTIME,1,10) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} AND SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,1,10) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}
AND SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,15,2)='00'

select SUBSTR(UPTIME,1,19) AS UPTIME, ROUND(ATD_102,3) AS ATD_102, ROUND(ATD_101,3) AS ATD_101, COMPRESSOR_P, HE109_T, CP10A_P, ATD_104,CP10B_P, ROUND(ATD_105,3) AS ATD_105, CP10A_T, CP10B_T, T852_P, T853_P, ROUND(ATD_103,3) AS ATD_103, AI016, AI014, ROUND(AI013,3) AS AI013, AI011, ROUND(AI015,3) AS AI015, ROUND(AI05,3) AS AI05, AI29, AI30, AI08, AI028, ROUND(ATD_106,3) AS ATD_106, AI01, AI020, SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,1) AS SHARPTIME FROM TBL_DATA_ANTING_HOUR WHERE
SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,1,10) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}
AND SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,15,2)='00'
LIMIT #{currentPage},10

select SUBSTR(UPTIME,1,19) AS UPTIME, ROUND(ATD_102,3) AS ATD_102, ROUND(ATD_101,3) AS ATD_101, COMPRESSOR_P, HE109_T, CP10A_P, ATD_104,CP10B_P, ROUND(ATD_105,3) AS ATD_105, CP10A_T, CP10B_T, T852_P, T853_P, ROUND(ATD_103,3) AS ATD_103, AI016, AI014, AI013, AI011, ROUND(AI015,3) AS AI015, ROUND(AI05,3) AS AI05, AI29, AI30, AI08, AI028, ROUND(ATD_106,3) AS ATD_106, AI01, AI020, SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,1) AS SHARPTIME FROM TBL_DATA_ANTING_HOUR WHERE SUBSTR(UPTIME,1,10) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} AND SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,1,10) BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date}
AND SUBSTR(SHARPTIME,15,2)='00'
